title: Create heart animation component
description:
Create a reusable heart animation component for transition screens.

File to create: app/fo-03/components/heart-animation.tsx

Props:
- message: string (e.g., 'You are doing great - the more you write the better affirmations!')
- onComplete: () => void (callback when animation finishes)

Animation:
- Use Framer Motion for smooth entrance/exit
- Heart icon that pulses or floats
- Message text that fades in
- Auto-advance after 2-3 seconds or on click

Used between Steps 5->6 and 6->7 as transition screens.
